actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that Federal employees who are erroneously covered by the Civil Service Retirement System may elect to continue such coverage or transfer to coverage under the Federal Employees Retirement System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal civil service law with respect to the Civil Service (CSRS) and Federal Employees (FERS) Retirement Systems to provide that Federal employees who are erroneously covered under CSRS may elect to continue such coverage or transfer to coverage under FERS.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that Federal employees who are erroneously covered by the Civil Service Retirement System may elect to continue such coverage or transfer to coverage under the Federal Employees Retirement System, and for other purposes.
